content: sun shower washcloth this is a fun little washcloth/dishcloth that can be knit up in just an hour or two or less using just knits purls and slipped stitches it creates a textured fabric that is fun to work up as well as look at i came up with the name sun shower washcloth because when i see the stitch pattern it reminds me of raindrops on a sunny day because of the yellow but you can use any color you d like yarn i used knit picks cotlin dk weight 123 yards 112 meters for my sample in the color canary feel free to use any cotton blend dk weight you would like make sure you have at least 70-90 yards 60-82 meters 1 needles the needles i used were size 6 us 4 00 mm circular knitting needles you can also use straight knitting needles it doesn t really matter just make sure your needle size fits the yarn you are working with gauge 10 stitches and 16 row over 2 inches in stitch pattern knit flat finished measurements 5 5 by 5 5 square washcloth cast on 28 sts using your preferred method of choice set-up row ws knit all sts row 1 rs knit 3 slip 1 with yarn in back *knit 2 slip 1 with yarn in back* to 3 sts before end knit 3 row 2 ws knit 3 slip 1 tbl with yarn in front *purl 2 slip 1 tbl with yarn in front* to 3 sts before end knit 3 row 3 rs knit 3 purl 1 *knit 2 purl 1* to 3 sts before end knit 3 row 4 ws knit 3 purl to 3 sts before end knit 3 repeat these last four row until your washcloth measures 5 5 inches 13 9 cm from cast on edge or your desired length ending with row 4 knit 2 row bind off all sts using your preferred method of choice and weave in all ends you are now done 2 thank you so much for following one of my patterns it means very much to me abbreviations sts stitches ws wrong side rs right side tbl through the back loop of the stitch simplestitchesdesigns 2025 3
